description: All material risk factors must be disclosed prominently
Forward-looking statements must include safe harbor language
Non-accredited investor limitations must be clearly stated
All fees, commissions, and compensation must be disclosed
Material conflicts of interest must be disclosed
Material risks must accompany any performance claims
All factual claims must be substantiated
No general solicitation if using 506(b) exemption
Must verify accredited status if using 506(c)
Required regulatory disclaimers must be present
Marketing materials must state they are not an offer to sell
Past performance does not guarantee future results
